summary: changes the depressing \'dragon soul absorbed\' message to make the game more lighthearted and fun
descriptionHtml:
changes the depressing \'dragon soul absorbed\' message to make the game more lighthearted and fun. See screenshot for details.

also probably the only mod on skyrim nexus that doesn\'t waste ram on things you\'ll never notice that should be fixed by anisotropic filtering anyway~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Check out my skyrimnexus profile for my other (more serious) mods here:
http://skyrimnexus.com/modules/members/index.php?id=3056619
author: tmonet
